typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Cl.documento compras} as string,
		{Documento compras} as string,
		Proveedor as string,
		{Posición} as string,
		Material as string,
		{Texto breve} as string,
		{Cantidad de pedido} as string,
		{Unidad medida pedido} as string,
		Centro as string,
		{Almacén} as string,
		Entrega as string,
		{Stat.tot.mov.mcía.} as string,
		{Fecha de entrega} as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		{Clase de movimiento1} as string,
		{Documento material1} as string,
		Cantidad1 as string,
		Lote1 as string,
		{Fe.contabilización1} as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		{Clase de movimiento2} as string,
		{Documento material2} as string,
		Cantidad2 as string,
		Lote2 as string,
		{Fe.contabilización2} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceXLSXTranStatus
SourceXLSXTranStatus select(mapColumn(
		ClDocuCompras = {Cl.documento compras},
		DocuCompras = {Documento compras},
		Proveedor,
		Posicion = {Posición},
		Material,
		TextoBreve = {Texto breve},
		CantidadPedido = {Cantidad de pedido},
		UnidadMedidaPedido = {Unidad medida pedido},
		Centro,
		Almacen = {Almacén},
		Entrega,
		StaTotMovMercancia = {Stat.tot.mov.mcía.},
		FechaEntrega = {Fecha de entrega},
		ClaseMovimiento1 = {Clase de movimiento1},
		DocuMaterial1 = {Documento material1},
		Cantidad1,
		Lote1,
		FeContabilizacion1 = {Fe.contabilización1},
		ClaseMovimiento2 = {Clase de movimiento2},
		DocuMaterial2 = {Documento material2},
		Cantidad2,
		Lote2,
		FeContabilizacion2 = {Fe.contabilización2}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns derive(ClDocuCompras = trim(ClDocuCompras),
		DocuCompras = trim(DocuCompras),
		Proveedor = trim(Proveedor),
		Posicion = trim(Posicion),
		Material = trim(Material),
		TextoBreve = trim(TextoBreve),
		CantidadPedido = trim(CantidadPedido),
		UnidadMedidaPedido = trim(UnidadMedidaPedido),
		Centro = trim(Centro),
		Almacen = trim(Almacen),
		Entrega = trim(Entrega),
		StaTotMovMercancia = trim(StaTotMovMercancia),
		FechaEntrega = trim(FechaEntrega),
		ClaseMovimiento1 = trim(ClaseMovimiento1),
		DocuMaterial1 = trim(DocuMaterial1),
		Cantidad1 = trim(Cantidad1),
		Lote1 = trim(Lote1),
		FeContabilizacion1 = trim(FeContabilizacion1),
		ClaseMovimiento2 = trim(ClaseMovimiento2),
		DocuMaterial2 = trim(DocuMaterial2),
		Cantidad2 = trim(Cantidad2),
		Lote2 = trim(Lote2),
		FeContabilizacion2 = trim(FeContabilizacion2)) ~> TrimColumns
TrimColumns sink(input(
		ClDocuCompras as string,
		DocuCompras as string,
		Proveedor as string,
		Posicion as string,
		Material as string,
		TextoBreve as string,
		CantidadPedido as string,
		UnidadMedidaPedido as string,
		Centro as string,
		Almacen as string,
		Entrega as string,
		StaTotMovMercancia as string,
		FechaEntrega as string,
		ClaseMovimiento1 as string,
		DocuMaterial1 as string,
		Cantidad1 as string,
		Lote1 as string,
		FeContabilizacion1 as string,
		ClaseMovimiento2 as string,
		DocuMaterial2 as string,
		Cantidad2 as string,
		Lote2 as string,
		FeContabilizacion2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestintarionSynapseTrans
